value_i18n.en_US: As a growing brand, reliable operations management is the backbone of business success. Veriday’s Retail Accelerator centralizes your multi-channel operations systems into one platform every team member can rely on and adapts to the complexities of your organization.
Optimize the interactions between various levels in a large retail organization
Task management and checkpoints for accountability
Keeping all communication integrated on a single platform makes reporting easy
It is essential to track communications and guarantee the excellence and compliance of each retail process

What Will You Get?


   Personalized Experience:
   Demographics, user profile, journey stage, intent and more

   Targeted Content:
   Publish targeted and personalized content to the right person at the right time

   Daily Task Manager:
   You and your people know what to do and when they should do it, and when it's done, it's accurately reported

   Integration:
   Your team has easy access to data integration such as sales date, mystery shop results, ticketing and workforce


Company Profile


At Veriday, every employee is inspired to innovate, improve and transform digital experience, enabling client and employee engagement, through our products and services. Veriday means “Honest Day”, reflecting our passion for delivering an honest day’s work with 100% client focus.

We build award winning Marketing Software & Services. Our Marketing Platform, Digital Agent, enables financial institutions to empower their advisors to create personalized websites while maintaining brand control.
